code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     // enable jackson type converter by setting this property on CamelContext     context.getGlobalOptions().put(JacksonConstants.ENABLE_TYPE_CONVERTER, "true").     return context. }

@Test public void shouldConvertMapToPojo() {     String name = "someName".     Map<String, String> pojoAsMap = new HashMap<>().     pojoAsMap.put("name", name).     TestPojo testPojo = (TestPojo) template.requestBody("direct:test", pojoAsMap).     assertEquals(name, testPojo.getName()). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:test").convertBodyTo(TestPojo.class).         }     }. }
